text: Peter "Pete" Hamilton (July 20, 1942 - March 21, 2017) was an American NASCAR racer. He was born in Dedham, Massachusetts. He won four times in his career (including the 1970 Daytona 500), three times driving for Petty Enterprises. Hamilton died in Boston, Massachusetts on March 21, 2017, aged 74. ==References== ==Other websites== *"2 Minutes With.."
